Which would be the best way to ensure cachability of a resource where a
limited set of individuals require access, but cannot share a common URI.

1) Assign a user/pwd pair and a single URL.  In this case, the user/pwd is
little more than a nonce.
2) Generate a unique URL for each individual (likely by adding a nonce to
the end of the path), then use the "Content-Location:" header with a single,
global URL value.
3) Other thoughts?

---
Seairth Jacobs
seairth@...
